entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,115Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 53

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

entry.title: Rule Number One: Don't Fall in Love With Your Best Friend's Brother
entry.summary:
Author: Violin715

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 84,281Chapters: 17/30Kudos: 401

Summary: Stiles absolutely, most definitely, totally does NOT have a crush on Derek Hale. Not at all. He doesn't.He grew up with the Hale kids and saw every embarrassing moment along the way. How could he have a crush on someone he saw cry the first time they saw their beta shift in the mirror? Someone he saw literally almost bite off their own finger while eating. entry.title: Fighting for Hope
entry.summary:
Author: Zero_Nemad

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,789Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 47

Summary: Stiles Stilinski, a bright young police man in training, travels to Europe with his Dad.There he suffers a terrible tragedy: Getting deported into sexual slavery.Being sold as an "American Virgin Boy Nr. 14", it appears to be his fate to provide sexual services to any customer.But one strange customer might just be his chance for freedom. Derek Hale comes from a wealthy family, defies the criminal system he was born into and tries to rescue two little girls from being trafficked.After spending years in a private prison, he finally breaks free and resumes his life's work. And he is out to take revenge.What he did not anticipate was falling in love with a guy named Stiles. How will they escape the grasp of an internationally operating slavery syndicate?How will Stiles find trust again? Love and hope despite everything?
